input: Find the IDs of loan contract borrower party change requests that have a completion date in the last month and a reason code of 3, and also include the new borrower's identifying elements.

output.sql: SELECT ID, NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements FROM LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest WHERE CompletionDate >= DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) AND ReasonCode = '3';
